values:
Whoa its been more than a year since i've last updated my journal! i just dont have that luxury of time anymore to just sit down and start typing about my day. It's been a little over six months since i've started working and i thought i was getting the hang of managing the whole business but i guess i was wrong. apparently my mom thinks that i have yet to learn other stuff relating to the business. 

So here's the thing, for tha past 3 months i've been working, ive been sleeping really late, thus the result of waking up late too. Everyday i wake up around 12 noon, and it's starting to really piss my mom off. honestly , i want to wake up earlier but how can i force myself to sleep when im not the least bit sleepy? it's like forcing yourself to eat when you're full! And she's been on my case about me getting more responsibility, and that just means more work. 

It's not like i dont enjoy working for her, but i hate it when she's in her fickle minded state of mind. Honestly, one minute she would be saying one thing , and the next thing you know she changes it just like that. Even our customers get confused when she's in this state which of course happens every time she's pricing the merchandise bought by our valued clients. And then, she would blame ME, or my sister , or the secretary how come our prices change every so often. It's so irritating how i still cant move since im under her turf. It sucks that i cant even watch my fave shows on tv simply because she's watching. damn it. i want to be independent but i know that if i do that it's goodbye to everything i have right now and i dont think i can handle that yet. 

i just hope she realizes that she's pissing everyone of in our family simply by still trying to control us! i dont care if that's what she experienced during her growing up years, people are more independent now and she should start living with it.

starbucks :) with julie and cher ing :)

 

i really am getting ft :( even the pictures think so :( i better start dieting :( its because there's nothing to et except oild rice toppings, oily hotdogs etc. which is really difficult for me to resist since i love rice, i love yang chow fried rice, i love fishes, i love hotdogs and eggs :(

damn. give me a month and ill be able to reach 120 lbs.

not good. NOT GOOD AT ALL.

<h2>You're Almost Ready to Get Married, But Not Quite</h2>
No doubt that you've warmed up to the idea of marriage and life long love<br>
You just aren't quite ready to follow up with your desires, yet.<br>
You may be a bit young, or a bit commitment phobic?give it time.<br>
Concentrate on guys who you can imagine being with next year. Forever can wait.

HEY EVERYONE! :)sorry val, medyo nahihirapan pa ako gumamit ng livejournal...di ko na mahanap yung entry na sinulat mo for me :) to ange nd val: ah..how do u upload pictures ba? :) i dont know how :( to cdc: ah..can i still pass my resume? :)

finally, i have friends! hehe :) i hve a rasta friend that looks just like bob marley with the dreadlocks nd everything! haha :) we're only 7 filipinos in our school...sad to say, panget mga to dito :( khit jpanese or korean :( although we do get to meet a lot of foreigners :)

it's still freakin cold here :( i cnt even type properly cause my  hands are freezing event though im inside the dorm! ive been doing a lot of shopping for the past week, i started out having 2000rmb and now im left with 400rmb!!! im dead. i hve to make it last until march 25 coz thats when il be getting my next allowance!

oh well gtg :) till next time! :)

our pink room :)

the 3 of us ! :)

Welcome to SHANGHAI! haha :) graabe, i never imagined it to be so cold here! negative 2 degrees lng naman yung temperature! well, at least i was able to experience wearing fur! haha :) i thought the c.r. would be more westernized, but i guess i was wrong. it's still the same old c.r. na nasa floor :( to think na yung mga my bayd pa n c.r. yung mga sobrang baho!!! exagg tlaga! And i actually miss Filipino food (although i still love yng chow fried rice)! i miss my friends, my bf, tin-tin, haha etc :( i miss my dogs :( kailangn lagi pa magtipid dito :( 

Kaktpos lng ng first day of classes and i thot i would have made more friends now...pero wala. Napagalitan pa ko kasi maingay daw kmi ni dianne :( ksalann ko ba na alam ko na ung inaral nila? haha :) Anyway, sorry if im not able to keep in touch... text me n lang :) although dont expect me to reply palagi :( nyway i miss you guys :) mwah :)
